text:
e="preserve">Milad Hatamabadi, nicknamed Milad Hatami (born in 1981 in Tehran), is an Iranian Instagram influencer who was arrested in January 2012 by the Turkish police in Istanbul.
Milad Hatami was born in 1981 in Tehran. After migrating to Turkey, he shared many videos of himself during the day. He has been living in Turkey with his wife for several years, and the result of this life together was a girl. Milad Hatami was officially married to Ms. Sahar Hatami on May 7, 2016 in Turkey.
When Hatami was in Iran, he first started his career on Instagram, claiming by bringing women in his videos that he had shaped their body in this way and that he was the best coach in Iran. Hence, he called himself Mr. Coach.
